Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Gods

Class Prometheus

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Gods.God
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Gods.Prometheus
public class Prometheus
extends God
If Player's Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • move

      public boolean move​(Direction direction, Worker worker) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidMoveException
      This method moves a Worker from a Slot to another, towards the destination specified.
      Overrides:
      move in class God
      Parameters:
      direction - where the worker wants to move to.
      worker - the Player's Worker to be moved.
      Returns:
      true if the worker moved voluntarily up on the third level, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the destination Slot is outside the Board
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is not permitted.

    • build

      public void build​(Direction direction, Worker worker) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidBuildException
      This method builds a construction on the Slot adjacent to the Worker in the direction chosen.
      Overrides:
      build in class God
      Parameters:
      direction - specifies the slot where to build
      worker - one of the player's workers
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the Slot where to build is outside the Board
      InvalidBuildException - if the build is not permitted.

    • resetParameters

      public void resetParameters()
      It reset the parameter moveThenBuild as it changes in every turn.
      Overrides:
      resetParameters in class God

    • checkIfCanGoOn

      public boolean checkIfCanGoOn​(Worker worker)
      This method checks if the worker is paralyzed or not.
      Overrides:
      checkIfCanGoOn in class God
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker chosen to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the worker can go on, false otherwise.

    • checkOrderOfActions

      public boolean checkOrderOfActions​(Action action)
      This method checks if the order of the actions is correct. If the player wants to move there is anything to control, as he can move both before and after build. If the player wants to build, must be checked if he has built before moving or not.
      Overrides:
      checkOrderOfActions in class God
      Parameters:
      action - the action to control.
      Returns:
      false is the order is correct, true otherwise.

    • validateEndTurn

      public boolean validateEndTurn()
      This method checks if the player has completed a turn or if he still have to do some actions.
      Overrides:
      validateEndTurn in class God
      Returns:
      true if he can end his turn, false otherwise.

    • moveThenBuild

      boolean moveThenBuild()
      This method return the status of Prometheus. It isn't callable by the interface God, because it's a Prometheus' personal field.
      Returns:
      true if Prometheus is obligated to do a normal turn (because he moved before having built).
